    Forecasting Trends with `threedx`

Vectorized weights_exponential()

Source: R/weights_exponential.R
weights_exponential_vec.Rd

Vectorized weights_exponential()

Usage

weights_exponential_vec(alphas, n)

Examples

t(vapply(
  X = c(1, 0.2, 0.5, 0.8, 0),
  FUN = weights_exponential,
  n = 50,
  FUN.VALUE = numeric(50),
  USE.NAMES = FALSE
))
